headline: Should You Reconsider Occidental Petroleum and Buy These 2 Oil Giants Instead?
summary: Warren Buffett, the CEO of Berkshire Hathaway, is followed with almost religious zeal on Wall Street.  Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY) has received Buffett's support.  It may seem like a lifetime ago at this point, but in 2019 Chevron (NYSE: CVX) was attempting to buy Anadarko Petroleum.
